title: Your weather update for Thursday (21)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western and Southern provinces.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Sabaragamuwa, Central, and Uva provinces during the evening or night.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
